packbuggies.descripcio: Vine i gaudeix d'una excursi√≥ amb buggie i para un moment a fer un emocionant paintball o una room escape. Combina el pack al teu gust. Buggie + paintball o buggie + room escape.
packbuggies.nota: * To be able to drive a buggie you have to be older thatn 25 years old and have a driver licence for more than 2 years.
